snippet: The president of Spain's Olympic committee would like to see Rafael Nadal as the country's flag bearer in Rio de Janeiro, in part to make a statement after recent doping accusations made against him....
lead_paragraph: The president of Spain's Olympic committee would like to see Rafael Nadal as the country's flag bearer in Rio de Janeiro, in part to make a statement after recent doping accusations made against him.

headline.print_headline: Head of Spanish Olympic Committee Wants Nadal as Flag Bearer
headline.main: Head of Spanish Olympic Committee Wants Nadal as Flag Bearer
